org.apache.poi.hpbf
Class HPBFDocument

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.poi.POIDocument
      org.apache.poi.hpbf.HPBFDocument

public final class HPBFDocument
extends POIDocument

This class provides the basic functionality for HPBF, our implementation of the publisher file format.
